scripts.markdown-to-html: cat src/template.html > dist/index.html && cat src/*.md | marked >> dist/index.html && cat src/footer.html >> dist/index.html
scripts.build: npm run markdown-to-html && npm run add-lazy-loading && npm run add-markdown-css && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build-mac: npm run markdown-to-html && npm run add-lazy-loading-mac && npm run add-markdown-css && npm run copy-assets
scripts.deploy: git add dist && git commit -m 'deploy' && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
